name: Griffin Solutions Group
tagline: Agile Software Development in Atlanta, GA
description:
Griffin Solutions Group is a software consulting company specializing in Agile Software Development of mobile applications, web applications, and data services. As an Agile development shop, we are able to work closely with clients, fulfilling their requests with the utmost timeliness and flexibility
We work to provide clients with the unique solution required to develop and sustain a competitive advantage within their industry.
